Package interfaces

Interface ConcSiteInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcentrationSite
public interface ConcSiteInterface extends Remote
Operational interface of a remote object of type ConcentrationSite. It provides the functionality to access the Concentration Site.

  • Method Details

    • setAssigedAPid

      void setAssigedAPid(int assaultPartyID, Boolean state) throws RemoteException
      New state of the assault party. True if assigned, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      assaultPartyID - assault party id
      state - status of the assault party
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • setAssignedRoomID

      void setAssignedRoomID(int assaultPartyID, int roomID) throws RemoteException
      New room assigned to the assault party.
      Parameters:
      assaultPartyID - assault party id
      roomID - assigned room id
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • setRoomStates

      void setRoomStates(int roomID, Boolean roomState) throws RemoteException
      Update room status. True if empty.
      Parameters:
      roomID - room identification.
      roomState - room status.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • startOperations

      int startOperations() throws RemoteException
      Operation start operations. It is called by the Master Thief when he wants to start the heist operation in the museum.
      Returns:
      state of the master thief
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • appraiseSit

      ReturnInt appraiseSit() throws RemoteException
      Operation appraise situation. As long as the master thief remains in this transition -> state : DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO
      Returns:
      master next transition or master thief state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • waitForThieves

      void waitForThieves() throws RemoteException
      Operation wait for thieves. Master blocks until enough ordinary thieves have arrived the concentration site.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • amINeeded

      ReturnBoolean amINeeded(int thiefID) throws RemoteException
      Operation Am I Needed. When thieves are needed they are added to the waiting queue and notify the master. (waitForThieves())
      Parameters:
      thiefID - ordinary thief id
      Returns:
      true if the heist is not finished and the ordinary thieves are still needed and OT state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • buildParty

      ReturnArrayInt buildParty() throws RemoteException
      Master creates a 3-member assault party
      Returns:
      assault party with 3 thieves
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • prepareAssaultParty

      void prepareAssaultParty(int[] assaultParty, int assaultPartyID, int roomID) throws RemoteException
      TOperation Prepare Assault Party.
      Parameters:
      assaultParty - list of ids of the 3 elements of the assault party
      assaultPartyID - identification assigned to the assault party
      roomID - room id assigned to the assault party
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • sendAssaultParty

      void sendAssaultParty() throws RemoteException
      Transition send Assault Party in the life cycle of the Master Thief.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • prepareExcursion

      ReturnInt prepareExcursion(int thiefID) throws RemoteException
      Transition prepare Excursion in the life cycle of the Ordinary Thief. CONCENTRATION_SITE -> CRAWLING_INWARDS The thief notifies the master that the last member of the group has arrived.
      Parameters:
      thiefID - ordinary thief identification
      Returns:
      OT assault party id and OT state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • assignAssaultPartyID

      int assignAssaultPartyID() throws RemoteException
      Function that checks if assault parties have already been created. If not, returns an id of the group that has not yet been created.
      Returns:
      assault party ID or -1 if groups have already been created.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • assignRoomID

      int assignRoomID() throws RemoteException
      Get a room that has not yet been assigned and still has rooms.
      Returns:
      room ID or -1 if all used or empty
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails

    • sumUpResults

      int sumUpResults(int collectedCanvas) throws RemoteException
      Sum up Results of the Heist.
      Parameters:
      collectedCanvas - number of canvas collected
      Returns:
      collected canvas
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry

    • shutdown

      void shutdown() throws RemoteException
      Operation server shutdown. New operation.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if either the invocation of the remote method, or the communication with the registry service fails
